quote: Gone are the days when just posting a house for sale is going to be exciting. People want to be entertained, informed, and inspired.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the traditional approach to real estate marketing and emphasizes the need for engaging content.
suggested_hook: Are your real estate posts just getting scrolled past? Here's why you need to change your strategy.

quote: AI can really help you craft a compelling bio, build your brand, and draft copy for your website and social media posts.
why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable use of AI that agents can implement immediately.
suggested_hook: Want to save time and boost your real estate brand? Here's how AI can help.
